Item.comments: starts Affected Doc Promotion with parameters
Item.method_code:
' NOTE: promition transition must be a valid transistion on the ' "Doc Change" lifecycle map!!! format = "<from>,<to>" Dim lifecycleTransition As String = "In Work,In Review"
Dim doc_changeId As String = Me.getId() Dim innovator As Aras.IOM.Innovator = Me.getInnovator()
Dim body As String = String.Format("<body changeType='{0}' changeId='{1}' lcTransition='{2}'/>","Doc Change", doc_changeId, lifecycleTransition)
Return innovator.applyMethod("Affected Doc Promotion", body)
Item.name: AffectedDoc-InWork-Review
